newsitem.title: USA: AMEX to list Nokia LEAPS, PCX to list two options.
newsitem.headline: AMEX to list Nokia LEAPS, PCX to list two options.

text.p: The American Stock Exchange (AMEX) said Monday it would trade LEAPS (long term equity anticipation securities) on the American Depositary Shares (ADSs) of Nokia Corp from March 19.
Also, the Pacific Exchange (PCX) said Monday it would trade options on Natural MicroSystems Corp and Plasma & Materials Technologies Inc on March 20.
The AMEX said Nokia LEAPS would open with strike prices of 50, 60 and 80, with expirations in January 1998 and January 1999.
AGS Specialist Partners has been named specialist.
At the PCX, Natural MicroSystems options would open with strike prices of 20, 22-1/2 and 25, with initial expirations in April, May, August and November.
The options have been allocated to lead market maker Joel Westle.
Plasma & Materials options would open with strikes of 10, 12-1/2 and 15 and expirations of April, May, June and September.
The options have been allocated to Guy Leung and Arvin Fong.
Position limits of 4,500 contracts have been set for Natural MicroSystems and Plasma & Materials options, the PCX said.
